item.title: Selected Working Papers
item.description: Party Effects in State Legislative Committees Pivotal Politics ad Policymaking Through the Appropriations Process in the U.S. Congress The Network of Proposed Bills in Congress Reveals Both Productivity and Idleness The Limits of Majority Party Power in the House: Evidence from Standing Committee Votes Substantive Gender Representation and Electoral Systems: Evidence from South Korea Legislative Professionalism and the Value of Women’s Committee Portfolios in State Legislatures
